issue.title: Voice audit: Research ecosystem section
issue.description: Audit the three property descriptions (.io, .space, .ltd) in the research ecosystem section. Verify specificity and value clarity.

currentText.io: 47 experiments published. Real metrics: time, cost, errors.
currentText.space: Learn the same patterns we use. Tutorials that show you how to build it yourself.
currentText.ltd: Rooted in Rams' design discipline: 'Less, but better.'
